items.sentence: Tom burned all the letters Mary had sent him.
Tom didn\'t know that the deadline was today.
Tom didn\'t know what Mary wanted him to buy.
Tom didn\'t know what Mary wanted him to say.
Tom didn\'t know what Mary was talking about.
Tom didn\'t like it, but he bought it anyway.
Tom didn\'t like spinach when he was a child.
Tom knows where to go to get the best prices.
Tom lied to you about having lived in Boston.
Tom locked eyes with Mary for a brief moment.
Tom lost his footing and fell into the water.
There\'s a problem there that you don\'t see.
Tom doesn\'t know why Mary doesn\'t eat meat.
Tom doesn\'t know why Mary isn\'t here today.
I was told that it\'s dangerous to swim here.
I wasn\'t aware that you were feeling so bad.
I wasn\'t sure whether Tom was joking or not.
I wasn\'t talking about anyone in particular.
I wasn\'t the one who called you. It was Tom.
Let us know when you\'ll be coming to Boston.
